::Rodimus Prime::

Rodimus: I agree. It's over now so I'm heading down there. Keep a lock on him but don't fire without reason.

Rodimus transformes to his truck/rv mode and heads over to Perseus and Dinobot's position, transforming back to robot mode.

Rodimus: It was a good fight. You both will need repairs.

Nic <warriorazure@...> wrote:                                  The two reply shots came too fast for Dinobot to dodge. The first hit
 him right in the chest, while the second whizzed right in his blaster
 optic. He was pushed upwards in the air and landed heavily on his back. 
 
 Dinobot: That... [grunt] that was... a good... fight. I concede victory.
 
 He hesitantly and slowly got back to a sitting position. His optic was
 gone, Blasted away by the shot.
 
 Dinobot: If you would be so kind as to offer me the hospitality of one
 of your CR chambers, I would be more than grateful. But of course,
 that will have to wait. As I promised, I have to reveal a lot of
 things, Perseus. 
 
 Farther, Doc was itchy with his rifle. He had quickly resighted
 Dinobot as he went down and did not move the barrel of his weapon by a
 millimeter.
 
 Doc: Rodimus, I really don't like this guy. We should at least send
 someone down there with Perseus to handle him in case he tries to pull
 a trick.
  
 --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Kraftlos <kraftlos@...> wrote:
 >
 > OOC: Grats!
 > 
 > BIC:
 > 
 > The first shot missed as he jumped to avoid the first shot.  Perseus
 > fired two shots back.  The second shot struck him in the chest and he
 > flew backward falling to the ground.  He tried to stand up before
 > Dinobot retaliated.
 >
 
 
     
                       

       
---------------------------------
